name: Microsoft Exchange Server欺骗漏洞（CNVD-2025-26718）
product: ["Microsoft Exchange Server 2016 Cumulative Update 23", "Microsoft Exchange Server 2019 Cumulative Update 14", "Microsoft Exchange Server Subscription Edition RTM null", "Microsoft Exchange Server 2019 Cumulative Update 15"]
description: Microsoft Exchange Server是美国微软（Microsoft）公司的一套电子邮件服务程序。它提供邮件存取、储存、转发，语音邮件，邮件过滤筛选等功能。Microsoft Exchange Server存在欺骗漏洞，攻击者可利用该漏洞执行欺骗攻击。
solution:
厂商已发布了漏洞修复程序，请及时关注更新：
https://msrc.microsoft.com/update-guide/vulnerability/CVE-2025-59248
patch: Microsoft Exchange Server欺骗漏洞（CNVD-2025-26718）的补丁
